H0.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Whistler

H1.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Salt Lake City

H2.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Innsbruck

H3.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Vancouvr

A4.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics were held in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, with some events in surrounding areas.

A5.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics featured events held in the nearby resort town of Whistler.

A6.text: Vancouver, along with Whistler and Richmond, was the host city for the 2010 Winter Olympics and the 2010 Winter Paralympics.
